message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to you is $12,000. I'm confident you'll love it!

Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  This is still a great deal for you, considering your value is $10,000, and it saves me some money.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $11,000. This is still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth it.
